programme.title: Van der Valk - 3ος κύκλος
programme.desc: Ένα ινδονησιακό τελετουργικό σπαθί που χρησιμοποιήθηκε ως όπλο σε μία δολοφονία οδηγεί τον Βαν Ντερ Βαλκ και την ομάδα στον κόσμο των μουσειακών αποικιοκρατικών κειμηλίων και.

programme.title: Οπενχάϊμερ
programme.desc: Σε σενάριο και σκηνοθεσία του Κρίστοφερ Νόλαν, το «Οπενχάιμερ» (Oppenheimer) είναι ένα επικών διαστάσεων θρίλερ, που βάζει στους θεατές στην αγωνιώδη και παράδοξη κατάσταση ενός αινιγματικού ανθρώπου που παίρνει το ρίσκο να καταστρέψει τον κόσμο, προκειμένου να τον σώσει.

programme.title: Μπιν, η υπέρτατη ταινία καταστροφής
programme.desc: Ο Μπιν, φύλακας στο Βασιλικό Μουσείο Τέχνης, πρόκειται να απολυθεί αφού τον έπιασαν να κοιμάται εν ώρα υπηρεσίας. Όμως, την τελευταία στιγμή, επεμβαίνει ο διευθυντής του Μουσείου, με μια καλύτερη ιδέα. Προκειμένου να αποκαλυφθεί η απίστευτη ανικανότητά του Μπιν, ο διευθυντής προτείνει να τον στείλουν στις Ηνωμένες Πολιτείες με την ιδιότητα του κριτικού τέχνης, για να βγάλει λόγο στην ιδιωτική έκθεση ζωγραφικής, που οργανώνει ο στρατηγός Νιούτον. Έτσι ο Μπιν βρίσκεται ξαφνικά στο Λος Άντζελες, σπέρνοντας τον όλεθρο στα μουσεία, τις γκαλερί, τα νοσοκομεία και τα αεροδρόμια...

programme.title: Son of a Critch - 3ος κύκλος
programme.desc: Η οικογένεια Κρις κάνει το ετήσιο τελετουργικό, το οποίο φρεσκάρει το σπίτι για την άνοιξη.

programme.title: Game R1
programme.desc: To Game R1 παρουσιάζει το πως δουλεύει και πόσο χρήσιμο είναι το gadget Nvidia Shield Pro, αλλά και το πως μπορεί να κάνει smart TV μία απλή τηλεόραση και να προσφέρει πρόσβαση στην κορυφαία υπηρεσία game streaming Nvidia GeForce Now. Ακόμη, αναλύει στέκεται σε πολλά και ενδιαφέροντα videogames που θα μπορέσουν να σας γεμίσουν το χρόνο με την παρέα στις γιορτές, όπως τα Let’s Sing 2025 και Taito Milestones 3.

programme.desc: Πριν από τη σέντρα στους αγώνες του Europa και του Conference League, παρακολουθήστε την ειδική εκπομπή που παρουσιάζει όλα τα τελευταία νέα των ομάδων που συμμετέχουν στις δύο διοργανώσεις.

programme.title: Magic in Mistletoe

programme.title: My Norwegian Holiday
programme.desc: A grieving woman forges a deep connection with a Norwegian man when he discovers she has a troll figurine from his hometown. She soon agrees to accompany him to Norway to uncover the troll's origins and find her own path to healing, love and family.

programme.title: Happy Howlidays
programme.desc: Mia, a meticulous webpage editor for the Seattle Tourism Board, finds herself unexpectedly navigating the holidays alone. As the only one working, she's drawn into an unusual encounter when she encounters a stray dog.

programme.title: Three Wiser Men and a Boy: Extended Cut
programme.desc: The Brenner brothers are back and putting on a holiday pageant for young Thomas, while trying to cope with life's curveballs, including their mom's new boyfriend.

programme.title: A Christmas Cookie Catastrophe
programme.desc: Sparks fly between the new CEO of a small-town cookie company and the owner of a local bakery as they try to recreate a stolen secret recipe.

programme.title: A Christmas Cookie Catastrophe
programme.desc: Sparks fly between the new CEO of a small-town cookie company and the owner of a local bakery as they try to recreate a stolen secret recipe.

programme.title: Christmas Next Door
programme.desc: Eric Randall, an author of bachelor lifestyle books, is left in charge of his young niece and nephew for the holidays. Unsure of himself, Eric turns to his neighbor April, a lover of all things Christmas, for help.

programme.title: A Christmas Love Story
programme.desc: A youth choir director must write the title song for the Christmas Eve show, but she becomes distracted when a gifted boy joins her choir unbeknownst to his widowed father, Greg.

programme.title: Holiday Road
programme.desc: Stranded at an airport, a group of holiday travelers agrees to rent a van for a road trip to Denver. When their unexpected journey leads them into uncharted territory, they must navigate a series of misadventures that brings them closer together.

programme.title: The Christmas Cottage
programme.desc: As maid of honor for her best friend Ava, cynical interior designer Lacey is tasked with decorating a honeymoon cottage for the newlyweds. Although it's a simple enough task, she didn't plan on being snowed in with the bride-to-be's sexy brother.

programme.title: Christmas With the Darlings
programme.desc: When an assistant gives her final notice, she is drawn into helping the younger brother of her boss as he looks after his orphaned nieces and nephew through Christmas.

programme.title: The Royal Nanny
programme.desc: Working under cover as a nanny, an MI5 agent must resist the charms of Prince Colin while keeping the royal family safe during Christmastime.

programme.title: Haul Out the Holly: Lit Up
programme.desc: Emily and Jared are looking forward to celebrating the holidays together again, this time as a couple. They're also ready to work with members of the community to make this year's Christmas festivities the best yet.

programme.title: Christmas Made to Order
programme.desc: When an architect finds himself hosting his family for Christmas, he turns to a holiday coordinator for help. Her expert Christmas spirit brings his family together, but neither expected it to bring them closer to each other.

programme.title: Private Princess Christmas
programme.desc: After failing in her royal duties, Princess Violet is sent to an American leadership training program where she makes and unexpected connection with the stoic instructor, Captain Ryan.

programme.title: The Nine Lives of Christmas
programme.desc: As the Christmas holiday draws near, a veterinary student (Kimberly Sustad) and a stray cat challenge a fireman's (Brandon Routh) commitment to life as a bachelor.

programme.title: One Royal Holiday
programme.desc: When Anna offers a stranded mother and son shelter from a blizzard, she learns that they are the royal family of Galwick and that they are both in need of a little Christmas magic.

programme.title: A Christmas Carousel
programme.desc: Lila is hired by the royal family of Ancadia to repair a carousel and must work with the prince to complete it by Christmas.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Second Chance, First Love
programme.desc: After 15 years, a single father moves home from Hawaii with his two sons and, through a series of coincidences -- or Godwinks, ends up stuck in traffic next to his high school sweetheart.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Meant for Love
programme.desc: A chance meeting at a weekend wedding celebration brings together Alice and Jack, two singles from very different family backgrounds.

programme.title: Family for Christmas
programme.desc: After an offhand wish to a man playing Santa Claus, a woman wakes up to find herself married to her college sweetheart.

programme.title: Swept Up by Christmas
programme.desc: An antique seller and a cleaner clash as they work on downsizing a magnificent estate. As the two uncover the house's treasures, they find a way to reconnect the reclusive owner with his Christmas past.

programme.title: The Angel Tree
programme.desc: A writer reconnects with a childhood friend while seeking the identity of the person who grants Christmas wishes placed upon an angel tree.

programme.title: Miss Christmas
programme.desc: The tree finder for Chicago's renowned Radcliffe Tree lighting is left desperate to find the perfect tree. A letter from a boy promising his tree is perfect sends her to a small town where she learns his dad isn't willing to part with the tree.

programme.title: Christmas Under the Lights
programme.desc: Emily reluctantly returns home to her family's rescue ranch to organize the Christmas Carnival and works with a handsome artist to honor her mother.

programme.title: In Merry Measure
programme.desc: When pop star Darcy returns home to spend Christmas with her sister and niece, she unexpectedly finds herself coaching the high school choir with her onetime rival, Adam.

programme.title: Long Lost Christmas
programme.desc: Hayley is an interior designer who plans to surprise her recently widowed mother with the perfect holiday present -- the extended family she knows her mom yearns for.

programme.title: A Bramble House Christmas
programme.desc: While settling his father's estate, a man becomes suspicious as to why the man left his nurse a large sum of money after knowing her for less than two months before he died.

programme.title: A Blue Ridge Mountain Christmas
programme.desc: Hotel manager Willow returns to her stunning Virginia hometown to help her sister plan a Christmas wedding at the inn her family once owned.

programme.title: A Veteran's Christmas
programme.desc: Capt. Grace Garland, a decorated U.S. veteran, returns home after two tours of search and rescue in Afghanistan. After being separated from her beloved K9 partner, Grace must rediscover the magic of Christmas.

programme.title: A Christmas Melody
programme.desc: A single mother moves back to her hometown with her young daughter. Having a hard time adjusting, the daughter seeks help from her music teacher to write a song for the Christmas variety show.

programme.title: Trading Up Christmas
programme.desc: Michelle tries to get her sister a new place to live and all she has is a Christmas stocking to trade with.

programme.title: A Maple Valley Christmas
programme.desc: Erica is a rancher who's spent her whole life working the family farm with her mother and sister. When Aaron arrives and disrupts her plans, she starts to question what it is she actually wants.

programme.title: The Christmas Train
programme.desc: A cynical journalist must get from Washington, D.C., to Los Angeles in time for Christmas, and his only option is to take the train.

programme.title: Christmas in the Air
programme.desc: A no-nonsense professional organizer (Catherine Bell) learns that opposites do attract when she begins to fall for her client, a frazzled widower (Eric Close) who spends his time inventing toys.

programme.title: Marry Me at Christmas

programme.title: Christmas at Graceland: Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: A former tour guide meets a busy single father on a Graceland tour and agrees to be his temporary nanny for the holidays.

programme.title: A Joyous Christmas

programme.desc: NCAA je najpoznatiji košarkaški turnir univerziteta na svetu! Obavezno i ovog proleća pratite ko će biti najbolja univerzitetska ekipa u SAD-u i koje će možda buduće NBA zvezde zablistati. (LIVE).

programme.title: Pregled Evrolige: 17. kolo
programme.desc: 18 najboljih timova Evrope ponovo se bore za titulu najboljeg na kontinentu. EFES je zasluženo uzeo titulu prošle sezone, a čini se da će imati nikada teži zadatak da je odbrane. Mogu li Zvezda i...

programme.title: Trans World Sport
programme.desc: Interesantne priče i neobični sportovi iz svih delova sveta. Uvek ćete biti u toku uz ovu emisiju.

programme.title: Omaž zvezdama
programme.desc: Bokseri, fudbaleri, košarkaši... Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mestu, u isto vreme, kako ih uporediti i kako napraviti večne liste.

programme.title: Fudbal - Bundesliga: Wolfsburg - Dortmund
programme.desc: Fudbalska Bundesliga najviši je rang takmičenje u Nemačkoj koja od 1963. godine i svog osnutka visokom kvalitetom igre oduševljava sve fudbalske poklonike širom sveta.

programme.title: Fudbal - Portugalska liga: Gil Vicente - Sporting
programme.desc: Prvi liga portugalskog fudbala, Primeira liga, osnovana je 1934. i broji 18 klubova. Najviše osvojenih titula prvaka ima lisabonski gigant Benfika.

programme.title: Uži izbor
programme.desc: Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mestu, u isto vreme, kako ih uporediti i kako napraviti večne liste. Neko će probati ono o čemu se decenijama priča...

programme.title: Fudbal - Turska liga: Goztepe - Rize
programme.desc: Turska Superliga je najviša profesionalna liga Turske u fudbalu. Ova liga osnovana je 1957. godine.

programme.title: Fudbal - Bundesliga 2: Kaiserslautern - Koln
programme.desc: Popularna "Cvajta" čini se, nikada nije bila jača. Ko će se od velikana vratiti u prvu ligu? Mesta je malo a kandidata mnogo.

programme.title: Fudbal: Zalivski kup: Qatar - UAE
programme.desc: Svake druge godine, fudbalske reprezentacije Bahreina, Iraka, Kuvajta, Omana, Katara, Saudijske Arabije, Ujedinjenih Arapskih Emirata i Jemena okupljaju se u borbi za pobedu na prestižnom Zalivskom...

programme.title: Fudbal - Holandska liga: AZ Alkmaar - Twente
programme.desc: Očekuje se trka Ajaksa i PSV-a za titulu. Može li Fejenord da im se priključi ili će AZ Alkmar napasti iz senke?

programme.title: Fudbal - 3. Bundesliga: Viktoria Koln - Sandhausen
programme.desc: Neki nekadašnji šampioni Nemačke su ovde. Ulazak u Cvajtu znači mnogo slave i novca, ali dug je i naporan put do cilja.

programme.title: Fudbal - Turska liga: Besiktas - Alanya
programme.desc: Turska Superliga je najviša profesionalna liga Turske u fudbalu. Ova liga osnovana je 1957. godine.

programme.title: Rivalitet legendi
programme.desc: Vukli su jedni druge napred, uvek je neki rivalitet izdizao sport na lestvicu više. Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova.

programme.title: Američki koledž fudbal - Gasparilla Bowl: Florida - Tulane
programme.desc: Koledž fudbal je američki fudbal koji igraju timovi sportista-studenata u okviru američkih koledža, univerziteta i vojnih akademija. Univerzitetski fudbal je jedna stepenica niže u odnosu na...

programme.title: Fudbal - Bundesliga 2: Nurnberg - Braunschweig

programme.title: Pregled Rally Dubai Baja
programme.desc: Pregled najboljih momenata sa reli trke koja se održava u Dubaiju, najnaseljenijem gradu Ujedinjenih Arapskih Emirata. Uživajte u neverovatnim potezima iskusnih trkača i snimcima adrenalinske vožnje...

programme.title: Rukomet - Nemačka liga: Melsungen - Hannover
programme.desc: Rukometna Bundesliga je najviši rang takmičenja u Nemačkoj. Kvalitetom igre smatra se jednim od najkvalitetnijih rukometnih liga na svetu. (LIVE).
